name: Hydro Elemental Equipment
description:
The character to which this is attached takes -1 DMG and does +1 healing.
This status will provide 2 instances of Hydro Application (Can be depleted using Elemental Reactions): Once the instances are depleted, this status will be removed, and will Stun the character to which this is attached.
descriptionraw: The character to which this is attached <color=#FFFFFFFF>takes -1 DMG and does +1 healing</color>.\nThis status will provide 2 instances of <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro Application</color> (Can be depleted using Elemental Reactions): Once the instances are depleted, this status will be removed, and will <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C100001]</color> the character to which this is attached.
